attributes.action: give every british citizen with dyslexia the right to improve there english
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a lot of dyslexic adults and children in the u.k. who recieve no help from our government .
If a person is dyslexic they should have a grant from the government  for the fees etc to enable them to improve there british language by learning to read , write , spell and use grammer properly
